thrikunamalaya nawika ha sagarika widyapitaye pradhana sarambaa pitiyedi pawathwu itha wichithrawath adhikariyata path kirime ulelakin pasu owun wisira yana lada athara, ema awasthawa sandaha pradhana aaradhitha amuththa washayen nawika hamudadhipathi, wayis admiral sirimewan ranasinha mahatha sahabhagi wiya.
jathyanthara weladamedi mahathiththa, gokanna, jambakolapattana wage warayawal pradhana thanak gaththa.

ee prakashaye prathama sinhala anuwadaya palakerune dinamineya.usas adhyapana mattame widyarthinta, puwathpath kalawa pilibanda thawakalika puhunuwak labadima sandaha lekhawus aayathanayen labunu idakadin, ee widyarthin boho dena dinamina kathu mandulla ha samanga ekwa, me deshaye janasanniwedanaya pilibanda purogami usas adhyapana patamalawata, dinamina puwathpatha ya kalaha.dinamina kathu mandullehi, eda apa gathakala jiwana charyawa, wichithra mathakayan rashiyaka uulaya wuyeya.ada dinamina kathu mandulle suhadayantath, ee athithaya sihipath kota gannata awasthawa labenne nam dinamina kathu mandulla ha bandunu manawa ithihasaya pilibanda hrudayangama kathawa, akhanda sampradayak washayen pawathwagena ya hakiwe.ma asa athi paridi.

thrasthawadayen nidahas kara gath rata nawatha bedumwadinta pawaradimata yana nawa aandukrama wyawasthawath, pethihasika sammathayata pitupa bhikshuwa palanaya kirima sandaha wu gihiyanta pawaru bhikshu kathikawathath unwahansege dadi dosha darshanayata lak wiya.
mama shalawa pura das pa karami.
ee anuwa ee sandaha pawule udawiyata awasara labadiya hakidayi kathanayakawarayagen wimasimata kamathi bawa wikramasinha mahatha ada parlimenthuwedi prashna karana ladi.

(lanka ee niws -2017.nowa.07, pe.wa.11.30) maithri -maharaja kuta kattuwa wisin dawantha komis kuttiyak daha ganima sandaha miladi ganimata giya rusiyanu parana yuda naw dil ekata kana koka handa thibe.
paradesakkarayinta aawadana, lankawa amarikawak karanna walikana samajayak bihiwemin thiyena kalayaka, pasal guruwarayaku washayen oba, obe samajamaya wagakima itukarana aakaraya athiwishishtayi.

ammayi duwayi akkayi nangiyi wage inna kochchara aadambarada?
kenaku heta dinayata awashya andum sakasathi.
mahiyanganaye sita gena pora mi gona uge himikaru samanga pitiyata langawiya.

kathandare diga wadi weyi kiyala hithuna ban digatama liwwoth...dethun siyak liyanne na ban sindu okkoma tdasayak gana liyanne.

eeth kohomada me duppath kella thaniyama eyapot yanne?
aadare thiyenne hanganna neme, eeka windaganna.
ee rajathema atalos wasak rajaya karawiya, uhuputh kalashoka rajathema atawisi hawuruddak rajaya karawiya.

niwfawund lanthaya saha labrador nam wathman palatha, peradi brithanya dominiyan rajyayakwa pawathunu athara, eya wisin soyaganime dinaya samaranne juni 24 dina wana athara palamu loka yuddhayehi miya giya wun pilibanda shokaya prakasha karanne juli 1 dinadiya.

deshasimawe hamuda bhatayin 4,700k randawa athi tramp eya yuda kalapayak bawata harawimata kayiwaru gasa, pasu giya sathiye foks niws hi sin hanitita wishwasayen yuthu wa pawasuwe, aarakshawa pathamin sitina pirimi, gahanu ha lamayinta mashin thuwakku harawimata hamudawanta niyoga kirima “eya kirime itha paladayi kramayayi” namuth “apita eeka karanna ba” kiya yi.

meya ihatha modala dekenma wenas wu mahinda modalaye athi suwishesha lakshanaya yi.samajiya sewa yatithala pahasukam2003 warshaye rupiyal biliyana 77.9 k wu rajaye yatithala pahasukam aayojana wiyadama 2009 wasare di rupiyal biliyana 310.3 k dakwa da, 2012 wasare di meya rupiyal biliyana 388.2 k dakwada, wardhanaya wi atha.
namuth "awilena suluyi" chithrapataye yamkisi aakruthimaya wenasak thiyenawa.

namuth saragi kiyanne eeka neweyi.

ma eya thaniwa osawagena yanawita eya owunata karana agaruwak bawada samahara piyan aththo sithathi.

mathiwarana nithiya yatathe siyalu deshapalana paksha thama wiganana wartha mathiwarana komasaris wetha yomu kala yuthuyi - amathi dinesh gunawardhana ajith alahakon, lasitha duminda deshapalana paksha warshikawa thamange wiganana wartha mathiwarana nithiya yatathe mathiwarana komasariswaraya wetha idiripath kala yuthu bawa aandu pakshaye pradhana sanwidhayaka dinesh gunawardhana mahatha eeye (10 da) parlimenthuwedi pawasuweya.
o nna kenyawe charika satahan wala dewani kotasath mese liyawena wagayi..

gamwala kerena sampradayika krushikarmaya harennata widyathmaka krushikarmaya gana mage danimak nomathi bawath pothpath sangara walin indahita yam yam de kiyawannata labena bawath ma ohuta pawasuwemi.
gabadawata danna issella me elawalu ushnaththwaya palanaya karanna wenawa.
wishala wihararamawala depala da rajasanthaka karini.
mama path wena thathwaya mona wageda?
thripitakacharya, abhidharma wisharada, rajakiya panditha aacharya sujith nishantha hewage2017-04-14 23:30:52 - 86454
mema kama wargaya nishpadanaya sandaha, hambanthota pradeshaya prasiddhathwayak usulayi.
awu 10 kata sarayak thamange lamayek marenawa wage thamayi.
wenura mage blaws eka galawanna dangaluwa.
pipirimen bas rathaya mulumaninma ginibath wi winasha wiya.
me pilibandawa api paththarawalata liyamin, wena ratawalwalata chodana nagamin sitinne nathuwa, yam kisi kriyamarga gatha yuthuyi.
ehi uparima wasiya randi aththe nawasilantha kridakayan wetha ya.
samanya jiwithayak thamayi gatha kale.
ehi thawath wishala pramanaye sinhala wirodi kriya siduwana bawa ehi sewaya kara thiththa wu deshamamakayan apata danwa atha.
tharamaka badaginne siti depala ge athulata yannata pakilune natha.

mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathiwaraya widhayaka balaya aththanomathika lesa bhawitha karamin 78 wyawasthawa nam rakshayawa 18 wana wyawastha sanshodhanaya genaemin thawathawath balawath kala bawath ohu pawasuweya.
ushnathwaya selsiyas anshaka 31 ta wada ihala giya wita sama witama bihiwanne gahanu sathun pamani.
ithamath aprasanna wima nisa ewani niwes wikinima ithamath apahasu we.
aanduwa wiwidhakara dushana chodanawan wegayen ath kara ganimin podu janathawage aprasadayata lakwima walakwiya nohakiya.
loku thaththa bandala wenama padinchi wela hitiye.
ehi amudrawya washayenuyi rupawahiniya bhawitha karanne.
kawuruda demala janayagen idam alla gaththe?
ee awakashaya thulama kalli lesa sanwidhanaya wemin ee waradi walata danduwam denna patan aragena.
eya sampurnayenma mema meheyum paddhathi mangin pahasukam sapayanne natha yunikod padawala ganimata nohaki wiya haka.
ema shapayen galawi gatha wi aththe masa kihipayak pamani.
ehi prathipalaya wuye mahinda rajapaksha anura disanayaka wisin gena aa wishwasabhanga yojanawen chanda 122ta 0k lesa parajayata path wa hu handa madin mahinda ha namal sabha garbhayen pala yamaya.
"machan mata dan kawuru dakkath kamak na mata oone chapawa balanna.."
janatha wimukthi peramunu samajikayanta podu samawak labadun aakarayata demala deshapalana randawiyanta da podu samawak labiya yuthu bawa mano ganeshan mahatha kiyayi.
arambaamu apa mese....!!!
awasana purwa tharagaye di kinswud widyalaya athin parajayata path wuye peradeniya gannoruwa ranabima rajakiya widyala kandayamayi.

kese wethath, kshetha්raye pawathina ihala nishpadana wiyadama, yalpana giya thakshanaya, adu nishpadanaya, puhunu sha්ramikayinge higaya, adu mulya pahasukam wani aduluhundukam magaharawa ganimata rajya anshaye saha anthar jathika aayathanawala sahaya awashya bawa amathiwaraya awadharanaya kara sitiyeya.
jiwana bara adinawa.
e් dawas wala ehema na..
api balamu, wisheshayan, samanya janathawage aarakshawa sandaha panawa athi pragnyapthi magin, yuda aparadha lesa salakena karunu.
athithaye patanma mewa gana anawaki kime hakiyawak apata thibuna.
pasugiya rajaya 99 awurudu badu dunna.
ganu denu thithata kerenne ee nisa.
thanathure ho thaththwaye usas wim labimata da hethuyi.
eya me wasare (2013) palamu masa dahayedi amerikanu dolar miliyana 15583.9 k dakwa adu wi thibe.
wayasa langata enne usa ya.
athule siti bandhanagara niladharin kihipa denekuge sahaya eeta laba ganimata jawipe samath wiya.

putuwa passata dala nagitta man inna thanata ee pimmenma awith kana mirikana gaman "mokakda modayo kale" man monawath danne naha.eth maha darunu aparadhayak karapu widiyata mata banne.eth man kale bima watila thibunu unu wathura bothela ahulala mese udin thiyanna hadapu de witharayi.mama neweyi mis kiyala mata eka wathawata wada kiyanna tharam shakthiyak thibbe naha.kawuru bima dammath waradakaru wela thiyenna mama.eka athule kali hellenawa.mage pasal gamane naraka dasawa labuwa."heta eddi wunu wathura bothalayak aran enna nathnam aaye iskole enna epa" kiyala tharjanaya kala.methek kalayak mistalama sinna wenna giyapu kumarodaya pothen mata guru mese laga indan wisikara mage mese udata.wada okkama nawathwala pallehata giya prinsipalta kiyanna.tika welawakin pahala panthiye lamayek awith mata katha kara.man pahalata yanna nagitta.
dala washayen gath kala eya galpadi ekasiya wisi pahaki.
me wasare karthu dekayi ithuru wela thiyenne.
passe danagaththa mewa grahaloka kiyala.
andanakota as walin le ena aruma puduma gahanu lamayek..!!
dahakata wada sewakayo hitiya shuwar ekatama.
parath paluyi, penathek maneka geyak dorak naha, ee madiwata minis pulutak pennawath naha.
mamayi thaththayi ekama wedikawe githa gayana karala thiyenawa.

mamath kothanakadi hari thanakadi kiyewwa loke inna kisima pirimiyekuta lingikawa ganiyek sampurnayen sathutu karanna ba eeth kawada hari kawuru hari kenek eekata mashin ekak haduwoth ganu ee mashima aran purushayan samaga lingikawa ek wima nawaththanawa kiyala.
buwa saha mathalan ayiyalage katha nam hithata kanagatuwakmaya.
